title: Angel
description: *Novel-Caulder's version of events from Falling to Pieces**Warning: Contains Spoilers! Do Not Read before Falling to PiecesWe all hide from the people around us. Strangers, acquaintances, friends, even family only see the parts of ourselves we want them to see. We conceal the cracks and flaws beneath the polished surface we put on display. Because we think we need to. Because we think people won't like us if they see who we really are. Because our egos demand it.We hide because we're proud. We hide because we're insecure. But mostly . . . I hid because I was afraid.
author: Jamie Canosa
